title: User Scenario (DAK)
description: Logical Model for representing User Scenarios from a DAK. Narratives that describe how the different personas may interact with each other.

resourceType.description: Resource type identifier for UserScenario logical model

id.description: An identifier for the user scenario

description[x].description: Description of the scenario - either Markdown content or a URI to a Markdown file (absolute or relative to repository root, like input/pagecontent/scenario-XYZ.md)

personas.description: References to persona IDs that participate in this scenario
